welcome_message_body: Welcome to Knoxville, where southern hospitality meets vibrant culture! Explore our charming downtown, visit the historic Market Square, and don't miss out on the stunning views of the Smoky Mountains. Enjoy your time in our beautiful city!

restaurants.name: Sunspot
restaurants.description: Sunspot is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in Knoxville.

restaurants.name: Central Flats and Taps
restaurants.description: Central Flats and Taps is a gastropub located in Knoxville.

restaurants.name: Victor's Taco Shop
restaurants.description: Victor's Taco Shop is a mexican restaurant located in Knoxville.

restaurants.name: Balter Beerworks
restaurants.description: Balter Beerworks is a gastropub located in Knoxville.
restaurants.address: 100 S Broadway St (Jackson Avenue), Knoxville, TN 37902

restaurants.name: Cook Out
restaurants.description: Cook Out is a burger joint located in Knoxville.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at McGhee Tyson Airport is the primary hub for all commercial flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The General Aviation Terminal at McGhee Tyson Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network 'TYS Free WiFi'.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gatlinburg Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying in on private jets, the private terminal at Gatlinburg Airport offers a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
